Package com.jpmorrsn.fbp.examples.networks

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Copy1
    Generate 100 test IPs and write them to the console
    Copy2
    Generate 2000 test IPs, pass them through Replicate and write them to console
    CopyFileToCons
    Read from file; run them through DuplicateString; write one set to the console, and the other st to Discard *
    CopyTR  
    Deadlock
    This network forces a deadlock condition
    FileCopy
    Read file; write to other file
    FileViewer
    Network executing first appkata example - not sure if this was ever tested...
    InfQueueAsMain  
    MergeandSort
    Network to Merge and Sort - output is written to Swing pane
    MergeSortDrop
    Network to Merge, Sort and Drop
    NoDeadlock
    This network is similar to the one called Deadlock, but you will notice that the port numbers line up! The additional Passthru's don't make any difference!
    ProcessLDIFs
    Network to process LDIF files - two files are converted to fixed format and then sorted together
    ScanDir
    Network shown in 3rd DrawFBP Youtube video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-AmzfhV2hIU Currently (Aug.
    SelRecipes
    Select appetizer recipes from collection of recipes
    SriramsTest
    This network is intended for timing runs
    SubnetD
    Simple subnet for testing
    SubnetX
    Simple subnet for testing, showing substream sensitivity
    Telegram
    Solution to Telegram problem, described in several FBP documents, inc.
    TestArrayPorts  
    TestBalloon  
    TestChainsNet  
    TestCounter  
    TestDeadlockDetection
    This test should not report a deadlock - before Sven Steinseifer's changes to the scheduler, it would have reported a spurious deadlock
    TestDropOldest  
    TestFixedSizeArray  
    TestInfiniteQueue  
    TestIPCounting  
    TestLoadBalancer  
    TestLoadBalanceWithSubstreams  
    TestLocks  
    TestMixedInput  
    TestNestedSubstreams  
    TestNullOutputPort  
    TestOptionalArray  
    TestSelNthItem  
    TestSockets  
    TestStackTest  
    TestTune  
    TestTune2
    This is similar to TestTune, but we have added 3 more signals into the SoundMixer component; also, the tune file has been hard-wired into a component (JingleBells), and 3 copies for other voices There is a problem with this: adding the signals together results in higher notes! Needs to be looked at!
    TextMerge
    This network is intended for timing runs
    TimingTest
    This network is intended for timing runs
    TPX
    This test tests RegExReplace
    TryBrowser  
    TryReplicate  
    TSS
    This test tests a subnet with stream-sensitive ports, and all the IPs going through the subnet are discarded; only the *SUBEND triggers (should be 3 nulls) are displayed
    Update
    This is really the front end of an Update app - instead of routing the merged stream to a processing component, we just display it.
    VolumeTest
    This network is intended for timing runs
    VolumeTest2
    This network is intended for timing runs
    VolumeTest3
    This network is intended for timing runs

    WriteReadInterpret  
    WriteToSocketFromJava
    Network to test Write to Sockets
